updateDifficulty(int, int) - Method in class ZombiesGame.model.Model
updates the difficulty by changing the max enemies allowed on the screen, and the speed of enemy movement
updateEnemyVelocity(Entity) - Method in class ZombiesGame.model.Model
updates the velocity of a given enemy recalculates velocity so that enemy moves towards player
updateEntities() - Method in class ZombiesGame.model.Model
updates all entity positions and player and enemy velocities
UpdateEntitiesMessage - Class in ZombiesGame.messages
The UpdateEntitiesMessage class is a message passed to the controller which tells the game to update the positions and behavior of all the entities present in the game.
UpdateEntitiesMessage() - Constructor for class ZombiesGame.messages.UpdateEntitiesMessage
 
UpdateEntitiesValve() - Constructor for class ZombiesGame.controller.Controller.UpdateEntitiesValve
 
updateHighScore() - Method in class ZombiesGame.model.Model
update the high score in file if current score is higher than previously recorded score updates the high score variable
updatePlayerVelocity() - Method in class ZombiesGame.model.Model
updates the player velocity based on which keys are being pressed
updateScore(int) - Method in class ZombiesGame.model.Model
updates the current score using given parameter if total score reaches a certain point, update the difficulty
updateScore(GameInfo) - Method in class ZombiesGame.view.GameOverPanel
updates the score and high score text on the screen
updateScore(GameInfo) - Method in class ZombiesGame.view.StartPanel
updates the text of the high score label
updateScore(GameInfo) - Method in class ZombiesGame.view.View
passes GameInfo to startPanel and gameOverPanel to update scores displayed
updateView(GameInfo) - Method in class ZombiesGame.view.GamePanel
